entry.title: Studying in UESTC

UESTC

In 2021, I entered UESTC with a college entrance exam score of 641.

entry.title: Hello Yaxin
entry.content:
Welcome to My Blog! This is my first post. I love pretty and shiny things, like Christmas trees, butterflies, and ice cubes sparkling in the sunlight✨. Even though I’m aiming to become an AI engineer, I also have a casual love for Web development.

A brief understanding of me

MBTI is INFJ

The INFJ personality type is like a hidden garden, full of depth and mystery, where every thought and feeling blooms with purpose🌷. They are dreamers, wrapped in a quiet empathy that flows like a gentle river, always seeking to understand the world and those around them on a deeper level💓. Their intuition is like stardust, guiding them toward paths others might not see, and their hearts beat with a deep compassion❤️‍🔥, always striving to make the world a more beautiful, meaningful place🧘🏻‍♀️.

More info: INFJ
